values:
In the year 2006 I resolve to:
Eat paste.

Get your resolution here

Too bad, everything you just wrote about me, isn't true. & trying to ruin my rep. by saying shit about me on the internet.. Yea, real mature, Jeff. I'm done sticking up for myself & proving you wrong & burning you back so hard you don't even know what hit you most of the time. Write all you want about me. Act like a middle scholar. See if i fucking care what you think about me. Grow up.

So today, was kinda "blah" & Raiders was kinda "ehh" (a little drama went down involving Mandie, which kinda angered me a little) But the awards ceremony was PIMP! as hell! Got my Raider shirt, WHICH HAS MY LAST NAME ON THE BACK!! & i gotta drive around the school for a while afterwords (& then home :D), which always makes me ecstatic.
Ooh & in regards to the comment "Someone" who left me on my MySpace, this is what i have to say to you: So, dumb ass! Well, all i basically have to tell you is that you NEVER listen to ANYTHING i EVER tell you. 1st of all- I SAID I WAS OVER YOU, DUMB SHIT! After the way you walked all over me even after i waited around for you for 2 FUCKING MONTHS, the LAST thing i want is to be w/you again. The names you called me.. yeah, you're definitely the biggest piece of shit i've EVER had sex w/. 2nd of all- The only reason why i'm still trying to talk to you is because, unfortunately, i'm not the type of person who can tell someone who was in their life for 8 months, to just "Fuck off". Sorry i'm not as cold-hearted as you are :D 3rd- Stop being so fucking mean. It's not "karma"; it's called being a cold-hearted, selfish, inconsiderate, jackass prick who lied to & used someone for 8 months STRAIGHT. Yeah, that's you. & last thing- I only cheated on you w/David. Curt was over the summer, while we were BOTH on vacation, & if i remember right, YOU broke up w/ME right before we left, in the cruelest way possible. You meant the WORLD to me, Jeff. Sorry i did what you told me you always wanted from me; sorry i actually cared.

.So i've come to the [conclusion] that istillthink about [you].

.a lil less than i [used] to.

Liz has a boyfriend now.

His name is Glenn.(AKA Glenny) He's 9405872395723055892045x's better than any guy i've ever talked to. He's that amazing. You're jealous. Admit it. ♥
::giggles:: He's on my cell phone. He makes me giddy. Yay

So for someone who just broke up w/the love of their life,

I'M IN A PRETTY FUCKING GOOD MOOD!!

:D Whoop whoop!! ::shakes booty::

^_^

= me whenever i was w/you today.
